Name: Mystical Barrier
Story Background: In a moment of dire need, the mage called upon ancient wards and mystical barriers, creating a shield to protect against the impending onslaught of dark magic.
Ability: Counter target spell unless its controller pays 3. If Mystical Barrier is countered this way, you may draw a card.
Appearance Description: A translucent, shimmering barrier of arcane energy forming a protective dome around the mage and their allies, repelling an onslaught of dark magic. The artwork is dominated by cool hues of blue and silver, with intricate swirling patterns creating a sense of mystical protection.
